title: The Best of Tom Bilyeu AMA | October 2018
description: Tom answers questions from the community. Impact Theory is proudly sponosred by: Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact Subscribe to our Channel: http://bit.ly/2HP4F3h Tom Bilyeu AMA’s are Live on Facebook and YouTube every Friday at 10 am PST. You can submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”. PEOPLE MENTIONED James Altucher 9:30 David Goggins 27:40   QUESTION TOPICS 00 :12 - Why you need to stop defining who you are based off the people around you and how to escape the negative thought loop 4:41 - How to get out of a victim mindset by shifting your ego to something totally different than what most people think (and the story of Tom’s life-changing “lightning rod moment”) 10:46 - What to do if you think you’re too old to start…   Just turn the weapons of belief into your favor by changing your self-talk.  (Say positive shit to yourself!) 14:28 - How to avoid going into a negative spiral of thought and develop an unshakeable belief in yourself 19:33 - How to cultivate a growth mindset, overcome deep insecurity, stop looking for approval and learn how to love yourself. 22: 17 - Which beliefs you need to let go of if you’re going to get anything worthwhile in life… and why you should consider living by a code. 24:40 - A massive heartbreaker for the “I want it now generation” and why you need to fall in love with fundamentals… 28:25 - How to break free of anxiety and procrastination by interrupting “identity level” beliefs . . .
